alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 2:34PM CDT until April 17 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 233 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lanark, or 11 miles southeast of Hampton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Monticello... Hermitage... Wilmar... Green Hill... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... New Hope in Drew County... Carmel... Farmville... Valley... Gravelridge... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Jersey... Sumpter... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
